channel.title: Products on Green Green Robotics
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Green Green Robotics

item.title: automatic_refillstation
item.description: Automatic refill station (Internet connected) Register your interest Automatically dispenses fluid into refillable bottles. Choose your volume and walk away User friendly, and ideal for stores fulfilling internet orders Low energy consumption and small footprint Can be flexibly positioned above a bulk fluid container. Avoids manual handling of bulk fluid containers above ground height. Low-level notifications and analytics The refill station tracks how much inventory is left in your bulk container for automatic stock keeping.

item.title: automatic_refillstation
item.description: Basic refill station (Open source) Register your interest Dispense cleaning fluids into refillable bottles. Fast, efficient electric pumping Low energy consumption and small footprint. Can be flexibly positioned above a bulk fluid container. Avoids manual handling of bulk fluid containers above ground height. Simple user interface There's only one button for the customer, no bells no whistles. Hold to dispense fluid, release to stop pumping.

item.title: register_interest
item.description: Register your interest. It's a real prototype, heading for market. We're preparing to bring our products to market in 2021 We're actively testing and iterating to create the right commercial products that meet customer needs. We'd love for you to be involved in this journey You can register your interest in our products, as well as indicating your interest in the beta testing program using the form below.
